text:
@AndrewScheer I agree with this video.

I would like to draw your attention to Dr. 'FlipFlop' Tam, she was initially correct regarding 'mask wearing'.

Science has shown #masksdontwork against the spread of Covid-19.

Cloth masks catch 3% of aerosols, none of which are covid-19 droplets.
